data.name: Hydra Sniper
data.description: Hydra snipers take careful aim before shooting to ensure perfect accuracy.

starItems.name: Hydra Sniper
starItems.description: Hydra snipers take careful aim before shooting to ensure perfect accuracy.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull ally
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, for self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull ally.

<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
This ability costs <color=#86e619>3</color> ability energy instead of <color=#86e619>4</color>
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, for self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull ally.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color> for self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull ally
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, for self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull ally.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull allies
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, for self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull allies.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull allies
Always gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

6.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, for self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull allies.

<color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Red Skull allies
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

7.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, for self and all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> and Red Skull allies.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
1.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
 > <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
 > On Spawn, Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for self
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
 > <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
 > On Spawn, Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
3.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
 > <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
 > On Spawn, Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for self
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Speed.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
 > <color=#fff568>HYDRA MINION</color> and Red Skull allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
 > On Spawn, Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
